jump_scares.spoiler: Chris looks behind a curtain and a werewolf lunges at him
A werewolf appears out of the darkness and attacks Brad
As Serafine removes her top, Andy briefly has a vision of her as a werewolf
Andy sees the disfigured ghost of Serafine’s mother
Andy sees Brad’s head on a plate of food
Andy, now transformed into a werewolf, jumps out of the fountain and attacks Amy
Andy’s shadow appears on the wall behind Amy
An apparently dead Amy suddenly opens her eyes and talks to Andy
A transformed werewolf suddenly jumps out from underneath some robes
A werewolf attacks two of the police
A werewolf jumps through a train window, shortly after the werewolf bursts into the passengers section of the train
David is knocked down by a werewolf which then begins to attack Jack
The werewolf attacks David
During a dream sequence, a naked David jumps on a deer and begins eating it
During another dream sequence, Jack suddenly opens his eyes and growls at Nurse Alex
A man opens the front door and is gunned down by some strange looking mutants
Nurse Alex opens the curtains and is attacked by a mutant
David adjusts the bathroom mirror and sees un-dead Jack in the reflection
A werewolf jumps out and attacks a young couple
The scene abruptly cuts to a telephone ringing
There is a close up of the werewolf’s face and a loud growling noise before the scene cuts to a train
The scene abruptly cuts to a lion roaring at a zoo
A man is attacked by a werewolf in the movie theater
The werewolf bursts through the door to the movie theater
The werewolf roars and is repeatedly shot
A deadite jumps out of the water behind Ash
A deadite comes out of the wall
Ash shoots Arthur’s sword out of his hand
A woman turns around to reveal she is a deadite
The deadite woman suddenly jumps up
The Necronomicon bites Ash as he reaches out to pick it up
Ash fires his shotgun
Possessed Sheila jumps on Ash
The girl in the store turns around to reveal she is a deadite
The zombie suddenly gets up and growls at Anna
A bunch of zombies suddenly burst through the wall
After the end of a musical track, there is a sudden cut to Anna jumping out of a kiddie pool
A zombie lunges out from behind the christmas trees
After Chris closes the door there is a loud cut to Anna running through some plastic curtains
After the red ribbon flies across the screen a zombie santa appears behind it and jumps towards the camera
Teddy the bear pops up on the edge of the bed
The dollhouse bursts open
A silhouette of a demon appears in the hallway
Benny appears behind the phone
Jack slaps her across the face
Bee gets scared by Greg climbing up the stairs
As Bee is looking around, David suddenly throws his body against the window behind her
After being woken up by Alice, Greg’s sudden move scares the group of girls
Sophie hugs Bee from behind
Dennis bites Paul on the hand
Paul leaves the camp fire and is startled by Grim and his dog
Jeff opens the door and the infected man is standing outside
Bert jumps out at Marcy in the kitchen
There is a gunshot as the scene abruptly cuts to Bert and Jeff
A man puts his hand on Paul’s shoulder while he is looking into a bedroom
Karen vomits blood over the windscreen
Paul sees a deer on the road
Paul dreams about happier times with Karen, the dream is interrupted by an image of Karen’s horribly diseased face. [Video]
Jeff is shot repeatedly
Patriot grabs Shelly’s pigtail and it comes right off to reveal a bloody patch on her scalp. A few seconds later Shelly turns around and lunges at Patriot
Shelly lunges at another student in the playground
A hand appears on the door of the nurses office
Wade bursts into the staff room, startling the other teachers
A group of infected students appear in front of the window behind Rebekkah
An infected student jumps up from the back seat to grab the policeman
Wade opens the staff room door and an infected student is standing right behind it
A teacher appears from around a corner
The lights suddenly cut out
There is some loud banging as the children attempt to break into the room where the teachers are hiding
Lucy grabs Clint around the ankle while he is crawling through the ventilation duct
An infected child puts his hand on the grate over the ventilation duct
The vending machine makes a noise, causing the nearby infected child to scream
An infected child reaches into the car and grabs Clint
Doug turns a torch on and his face suddenly appears on screen, scaring the others
Lionel’s mother appears behind the nurse
Lionel’s mother comes up behind Lionel as he turns on the lights
Hands break through the door and grab Lionel around his neck
Loud sound
Loud sound
Loud sound
Loud sound
As Sloane hides in the apartment, suddenly the phone on the table rings
Sloane is pulled forward under the table
As Gwen walks through her apartment and passes the mirror again, you suddenly see the figure of a man. This is accompanied by a sound effect
Patrick is suddenly grabbed from behind
Patrick’s arguing with Sullivan. Suddenly, one of the soldiers standing around them is shot
Sloane and Melanie are talking. As Sloane turns around again, the doctor’s hand suddenly comes out of the bushes and grabs her
Patrick is looking for someone with the flashlight. When he turns around, there’s a man standing behind him. This is accompanied by a sound effect
Melanie runs with Sloane and Damon through the water in the cave. She grabs a rock and shines into a dark corner where suddenly a man is standing
After Damon says “Lets go” he is suddenly attacked by the doctor from the side
Sloane sees a double of her. After she says “I will never be you again”, the doctor attacks her
Patrick is suddenly attacked by Melanie with a knife
Sloane is attacked again by her double
Behind Melanie a man suddenly jumps out of the water and pulls her in
While on the Thunder Mountain rollercoaster, a man’s head hits against a ceiling, becomes decapitated, and flies at the camera
A park guest’s face shifts into a creepy smile accompanied by a sound cue as she walks past the camera
There is a sudden explosion at the Spaceship Earth attraction and it collapses
A loud slamming noise scares the boy, causing him to drop the bottle of wine
The boy stands up and gets grabbed on the head by the butcher
The butcher kicks the door open
While running through a hallway the butcher steps in front of the girl
While Millie is walking through her highschool, someone jumps at her and screams as a joke
Millie peaks out from underneath the bleachers, and the butcher jumps in front of her
Ryler rushes out of the bathroom and once she gets to the door the butcher (in Millie’s body) steps out in front of her
While Millie (in the butcher’s body) is walking through a haunted house, a toy ghost flies out at her from the side
A knife pierces through the door
Roses’s car runs into a deer
Accompanied by a high pitch piano note, Georgina can be seen walking past the hallway in the background of the shot
Accompanied by a sound effect, Chris spies Georgina looking out from a window in the house
Accompanied by a high pitch piano note, Georgina turns around and looks at Chris
During a tense scene, Chris closes a door to reveal Rose is watching him
After a long period of silence Chris suddenly runs at Dean and attacks him
As Chris goes to leave, Jeremy runs up and grabs him from behind
Chris drives into Georgina
The side mirror beside Chris is suddenly blown off by a gunshot
Accompanied by a sound effect, Chris turns to the side and sees Rose looking at him
While the player left behind by the bus runs to catch up to it, he is suddenly tackled by the zombie from the side
Lorit suddenly punches the framed picture on the wall, causing the glass to shatter
The woman outside is suddenly slammed against the phone booth while the doctor is inside it
As Lorit and Cleo look out of a window, a woman suddenly jumps in through the glass
A sudden bang startles the group
While giving a speech, the coach is tackled from the side by a zombie
Diago is grabbed by the mouth and pulled into a room
A zombie jumps out of the back seat
A zombie arm smashes through the door and grabs Diago
Gizmo jumps up from inside the box
Gizmo is startled by the camera flash
Pete accidentally spills some water on Gizmo
One of the new Mogwai snaps at Pete’s finger
A gremlin hand reaches out and grabs Pete as he goes to use the phone
A gremlin comes out of a cupboard. [Video]

A gremlin pokes Billy’s mother from behind
A gremlin, hiding in the Christmas tree, attacks Billy’s mother
The YMCA bell rings
A gremlin jumps onto Billy’s face. [Video]
A gremlin appears on the television
A saw blade is thrown at Billy
A ball hits Billy
The skeletal remains of a gremlin jump out at Billy. [Video]
Billy’s mother turns around and the antique store owner is standing right behind her
A girl runs down a hallway and the strange easter-bunny creature jumps out at her
The creature roars suddenly
A woman grabs Kate’s arm while she is on the phone
A hand bursts out of Kate
The man sitting in the chair suddenly turns around to reveal a contorted face
A man jumps up from a bush as Ryan walks past
After Ryan opens a storage cupboard, Samar puts his hand on Ryan’s shoulder giving him a scare
A person in a baby mask suddenly appears behind Ryan
After Tree and Carter check the cupboard and find it empty, Babyface suddenly appears behind Ryan
Babyface suddenly appears from behind some Babyface costumes that Ryan is walking through
Babyface suddenly tackles the security guard escorting Tree
The lights turn back on and Dr. Butler is standing right by Carter
A car suddenly crashes into the back of Kylie’s car
The driver of the white car walks up to Kylie’s window, accompanied with a loud musical sting
The computer that Kylie’s using, short-circuits
The freezer makes a mechanical noise, startling Kylie
A statue of Jesus wrapped in a white sheet stumbles and falls towards Kylie
After Kylie’s ankle bracelet beeps, grabbing her attention, a diseased-looking hand comes out from under a piece of furniture and grabs her leg
While she’s in the shower, Kylie crouches and is then attacked by the possessed teddy bear, accompanied by a loud musical sting
Graham startles Kylie while she’s dancing
The lights come back on and a veiled figure suddenly appears besides Dennis, accompanied by a loud musical stinger
While Amos is trying to look through the presumed killer’s window, Kylie suddenly opens it from inside, startling Amos in the process, accompanied by a musical stinger
The flash from Amos’s camera reveals the presumed killer’s silhouette standing behind a window, staring at Amos. This is accompanied by a loud musical stinger
The burned teddy bear in the back of Amos’s car suddenly starts to speak and startles him, accompanied by a musical stinger
Eugene slams into the door of the pick-up truck just as Kylie closes it. Accompanied by a musical stinger
Kylie turns around and Miriam suddenly appears in front of her
A sudden scene transition from a silent scene to Kylie loudly and violently opening a kitchen shelf may startle some viewers
Dennis suddenly goes on the attack, accompanied by a musical stinger
Miriam opens a cupboard in the bathroom and Eugene stumbles out of it, prompting both of them to scream. Close-up on Miriam’s face as she’s screaming. Accompanied by a musical stinger
After stabbing Eugene through the wall, Dennis suddenly kicks down the wall
Dennis suddenly comes out of frame and punches Kylie unconscious
A snake crawls out in front of Ig
The waitress looks in the rear view mirror and sees Ig
Several disturbing images flash across the screen as Terry overdoses on drugs
After a few seconds of droning sounds as the camera zooms in on the saleswoman, there is a sudden clinking noise that causes her to flinch
A sudden cut to a closeup of the zombie’s face in a flashback

The church employee taps Noddy on the shoulder from behind, startling him
The motorcycle suddenly traps the priest’s fingers
The surface of the motorcycle’s fuel tank reacts to holy water
The motorcycle breaks through the window

Needy turns around and sees a bloodied Jennifer standing right behind her
A crow caws and flies away as Colin climbs some stairs

movies.title: Stay Out Of The F**king Attic

jump_scares.spoiler: A hand hits the floor and a scream is heard
As they open the door a box falls down
Kyle jumps out from behind a couch to scare Lizzie
Lizzie puts her hand on Kyle’s shoulder while he is watching TV
Timothy suddenly appears in frame, chasing after Lizzie
Timothy’s hand appears in front of Mikey
A hand reaches out from underneath a car to grab a woman
A man’s face is suddenly engulfed in flames
A lady walks into another woman dressed in a Halloween costume
A lady leans back on the sofa to reveal Mary Bailey is sitting beside her
Over the next few seconds there are several sudden cuts to Bobbie (in red witch form) that may startle some viewers
Bobbie turns around to face Jack and her face morphs into the red witch
The killer bursts through the window
The previously dead girl suddenly sits up and screams
The girl bursts through the door
The “child” jumps out at one of the kidnappers

The camera pans around to reveal Bee watching Cole as he attempts to jump out the window

The gas station attendant suddenly appears in front of Holden

When Rick and the group turns around the group of Americans are pointing guns at them
A mild jump scare when Jonathan suddenly takes his hand out of his bag
When Rick and Jonathan first open Imhotep’s sarcophagus, his wet corpse pops out
When Evy reads from the book of the dead Imhotep´s corpse suddenly wakes up and lets out a roar
A shadow suddenly passes by
The ground suddenly shakes

Mr. Daniels checks the window and suddenly a sandstorm blows towards him

Evy runs into Anck Su Namuns

movies.title: The Return of the Living Dead

jump_scares.spoiler: While a person is contacting the police on the phone, a zombie jumps through the window
As the speaking character turns around to face the camera, they are unexpectedly shot in the chest in the middle of a calm monologue with no warning
As a character slowly backs into a large window behind them, a giant fleshy tentacle suddenly slams against it from the other side

While a character screams a triumphant phrase, a giant tentacle suddenly falls on them with a loud thud and squishes them, halting the uplifting music score and instantly shifting the tone of the scene
A teenage boy turns around and a machete blade is driven into his head
Lowell head butts McKayla
Syl trips on a rubbish bin
After switching the lights back on, Syl turns around and a masked person is standing behind her
Syl turns and sees another masked figure in front of her
Sadie clobbers Big Al with a baseball bat as he talks to McKayla
The scene cuts away from Sadie and Jordan back to the gym (as an ominous sound effect plays)
The camera cuts back to Mrs. Kent and Lowell is now standing behind her
Sheets blow upwards at a lady setting up Halloween decorations
Mr Wilkins is startled by noise and movement coming from a body bag
Billy jumps up from behind the table
A monster jumps from the swamp
Laurie spins around and comes face to face with a man dressed in a black costume
An egg is thrown at the old man’s window from outside
A reporter walks down a dark hallway and is hit by a stick held by someone off-screen
Alison lifts up a can of bug spray to reveal Dale standing behind it watching her
Chloe puts her hand on Alison’s shoulder
An unseen person appears in camera shot, ambushing the woman hiding behind the tree trunk
Chad taps on the car door and yells out (as a joke) which startles Alison
Chloe jumps out in front of the cop car
There are several loud gunshots
Chad ambushes Tucker who is attempting to hide behind a tree trunk
Dale looks up and sees Mitch impaled on the tree
As the friends zoom in on the dead body on Google maps, the killer suddenly turns up and faces the camera
After a few seconds of silenty zooming in on the killer, a phone suddenly starts vibrating, scaring the group
The killer unexpectedly jumps out of a garbage can
The car’s back camera turns on to reveal the killer standing outside
The camera turns back on to reveal the killer now standing right in front of it
The killer jumps out from the back seat and grabs Phil
Fiona approaches a door curtain to peek at the other side and it’s suddenly pulled open
There is a sudden pounding on the door
There is a very loud sudden cut from the protagonist staring at an animatronic, to a door opening
There is another loud and sudden cut to a fridge opening
The ostrich animatronic suddenly begins to shake violently accompanied by a sound cue
A door slams shut on its own
As the protagonist looks around a bathroom stall, an animatronic drops down from the ceiling right at the camera
As Liv is crawling around an airduct, an animatronic suddenly runs up behind her at a very quick speed
There is a cut to the siren animatronic running behind some trees accompanied by a sound cue
The siren animatronic jumps at Liv from the side
A knight animatronic suddenly stabs one of the teenagers
Kathy notes that one of the animatronics disappeared, and Bob responds “Where did it go?” after which the animatronic springs up behind them and attacks
An animatronic hand swoops down from the car window and grabs the police officer
The siren animatronic springs back to life as seen through a rear-view mirror
A zombie lunges at the camera
A zombie attacks a man in the toilet
A zombie bursts out of a toilet door and lunges at Columbus
A zombie appears in the back seat of the car that Columbus is driving
Columbus has a vision of a clown crawling under the toilet cubicle door
Columbus wakes up on the couch and turns around to see his neighbour has turned into a zombie. [Video
The zombie neighbour reaches for the door-handle
A mechanical figure pops out at Columbus in the haunted house attraction
A zombie attacks Columbus from behind. [Video
Freddie turns around and the killer is right on front of him
The killer suddenly runs at Ted
Bob is suddenly pierced through the chest with a knife
Steve, wearing a mask, jumps out at the counselors to scare them as a joke
Drew grabs Sam from behind as a joke
As Sam turns around he is suddenly stabbed
